name: AstroJunk
description:
A quick journey to space has led to you being surrounded by space debris. In this you must act fast and avoid getting hit by asteroids and other objects as they start to circle you and surround you until one day your stuck with no where to go. 

Game made for the epicmegajam.. and is still wip unless that jam is over :D 

 Endless game rack up points the longer you can stay alive. Destroy objects for bonus point and destroy the debris things leave around for even more points and maybe even a chance you will survive a little longer. 

Controls

 -mouse click to move 

-enter to pause game
